ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T23:03:04 [Issue ID 4000-159736] urn:comicvine:4000-159736 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 07:09:07. [Issue ID 645032]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Meet Cat Curio, intrepid investigator and babysitter as she investigates the strange case of The Mad Mad Mailman, and stumbles upon the trail of the ominous BLACK LAMP SOCIETY! And, in the present, Cassie, Vlad and Lisa chase a pet-pureeing snow blower through the horrors of rural Michigan in BLOOD BLOWER!
It's a HACK/SLASH DOUBLE FEATURE! TWO tales of blood and terror, one set in the past and one in the present!
ComicInfo.Teams: The Black Lamp Society,Lovebunny and Mr. Hell,Hack/Slash Inc
ComicInfo.Title: Double Feature: Mad, Mad Mailman & Blood Blower
